title: Is it possible to use a laptop as a full time mobile phone if it doesn't have a sim card slot? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sort of. If you are willing to limit your use to places where you have a WiFi signal then sure. Just install one of the many apps that allow phone calls over WiFi (mostly free) and you’re in business. As others mentioned, you can buy a USB cellular modem.

Yes, it does. It’s called a USB modem.  Insert the SIM in the modem, and connect it to your laptop. After installing drivers and software (depending on where you bought it (manufacturer or operator)) and having credit in the SIM card, it gives you both INTERNET AND TELEPHONY SERVICES)
